summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List , and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the U.S. Department of Energy outlines 30 open recommendations that it should prioritize. title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Energy
